titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend for one year the credit for mortgage insurance premiums treated as interest.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend for one year the credit for mortgage insurance premiums treated as interest.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through December 31, 2017, the tax deduction for mortgage insurance premiums treated as interest.
